name: Litellm
short_desc: LLM proxy server with multi-model support and unified API
author: BerriAI
description: Litellm is a unified interface to access various LLM APIs. It provides a simple proxy server that allows you to interact with different language models (OpenRouter, OpenAI, etc.) through a single standardized API endpoint.

form_fields.label: Master API Key
form_fields.hint: Master key for authenticating requests to the proxy (e.g., sk-1234)

form_fields.label: Worker Threads
form_fields.hint: Number of worker threads for the proxy server

form_fields.label: Store Models in Database
form_fields.hint: Enable persistent storage of model configurations in the database
